00713             }
00714

00717          }
00718       }
00719 
00720       /* ramp down */
00721       if (chn_bits[channel] & RAMP_DOWN) {
00722          delta = time() - t[channel];

00724             v_actual[channel] -= (float) user_data[channel].ramp_down * delta / 100.0;
00725
